title: homosapienstrader
author: homosapienstrader
content: I need 1BTC loan to buy hardware to solve puzzle 66(13zb1hQbWVsc2S7ZTZnP2G4undNNpdh5so), I have an optimized vanity algorithm that requires 1BTC worth of hardware to have the odds to find the HEX within 6 months than once private key found you keep 4BTC and I 2BTC+ I will provide you remote access to setup controller OS to watch hashrate running in real time.You homo sapiens that holds hundreds of BTC, lets put one to play with this low IQ game like a chimpaze enjoying entropy momentum.1HomoSLzBNqLhHrpDF2pLfSkU3M7uigxjQ

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: What guarantee do we have that you won't run off with the BTC ?Quote from: homosapienstrader on July 15, 2023, 03:06:33 AMYou homo sapiens that holds hundreds of BTC, lets put one to play with this low IQ game like a chimpaze enjoying entropy momentum.I think that the "homo sapiens" who hold hundreds of BTC wouldn't care about earning 4 more BTC, especially if they need first to send you one without any collateral

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: homosapienstrader on July 15, 2023, 03:06:33 AMI have an optimized vanity algorithm that requires 1BTC worth of hardware to have the odds to find the HEX within 6 monthsEnlighten me: what hardware are you planning to buy, how many keys/second will this get you, and how many possible keys are there to check. Unless proven otherwise, I think you're full of shit.

comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on July 15, 2023, 11:54:56 AMUnless proven otherwise, I think you're full of shit.I see this as just a more inventive attempt to scam.I mean, one should be pretty dumb to fall for this story: nice one, but let's get real, newbie will just go away with the money.LE: did you guys read OP posts in the puzzle thread?
